mapper.insert: insert into entry(entry_no, match_no, team_no, member_id, team_type) values (#{entryNo}, #{matchNo}, #{teamNo}, #{memberId}, #{teamType})
mapper.select: select E.*, M.member_name, M.img_no, M.member_manner from entry E inner join member M on E.member_id = M.member_id where E.match_no = #{matchNo} order by E.entry_no asc
mapper.update: update entry set team_type='away' where match_no = #{matchNo} and team_no = #{teamNo}
mapper.delete: delete entry where match_no = #{matchNo} and team_type='wait'
delete entry where match_no = #{matchNo} and team_no = #{teamNo} and team_type = #{teamType}
